Class CreateSubCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.cmd.BaseSubCommand<O>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubCommand<CreateOptions>

    public final class CreateSubCommand
extends CommonCreateAndPublishSubCommand<CreateOptions>
    Creates a post or site optionally as draft.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

      • createFileNameFromTitle

        String createFileNameFromTitle(String title)
        Create file name from title.

        Format: TIME_TITLE.md TIME is provided by time. TITLE is the escaped title.

        Parameters:
        title - must not be null or empty
        Returns:
        never null or empty
